text.credits: designed and created by Aida Narros

text.desc: Hello! I'm Aida, and I'm a Frontend Developer. I'm passionate about building websites with CSS and JavaScript, specifically using React, my favourite programming tool. I've created a good variety of projects using the technologies I know, from a web app to make CRUD operations to even a little game (which you can play if you want!). I'm very curious and creative, and I'm eager to contribute everything I can to a professional project, while I keep learning in the process!

text.proj1: Create, edit and browse cards with information about songs and artists.
text.proj2: Visual novel game in which you can get different endings depending on your choices.
text.proj3: Filter pok√©mon by generation, type and/or name and review their details.
text.proj4: Index of characters where you can render a diagram of their relationships.
